comment: Barrs not a mean guy, but he certainly is opinionated. Whether you agree with his political takes or his interpretations of the Constitution or not, just use whatever was in his lessons on your papers and youll pass just fine. Holding my tongue when I disagreed with his political stances was the only challenging part of this course.

He knows what hes talking about for sure and brings in cool guest speakers if hes gone but lectures arent consistent. No quizzes or tests only papers with no clear rubric. Knocked me down a whole letter grade for not enough participation when its hard to get a word in.

Bob Barr knows his stuff and is very knowledgeable about Government. However, he has an uncanny ability to make an interesting topic as dry as stale toast. He relies heavily on his assistant Barry who does everything Bob should be doing. He provides no visual aid for his lectures, and doesn't allow you to record them either.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: It's always cool to take a poli sci class with a former congressman. He's a nice professor, but very dry. He lectures the entire class and gets on tangents quite often. Be prepared to read and write.
